org.konelabs.stroll.graphics
Class GBAGraphics

java.lang.Object
  org.konelabs.stroll.graphics.AbstractGraphics<GBALayer>
      org.konelabs.stroll.graphics.GBAGraphics
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, IPlayClient
public final class GBAGraphics
extends AbstractGraphics<GBALayer>

Representation of the GBA screen hardware. The getInstance method must be used to instantiate the class, which provides only singleton access.

Use getLayer(layerNumber) to gain access to a layer

Author:
Keldon

          returns the given layer; null is returned if the layer is not loaded
